## Introduction

-   The main challenges for both RegTech providers and their financial services customers are internal make collaborative and [co-production](https://www.ukri.org/about-us/policies-standards-and-data/good-research-resource-hub/research-co-production/) research difficult.
-   These challenges point to research:
    -   gaps in data quality, security and privacy,

    -   interoperability and integration with existing legacy systems,

    -   lack of Financial Institutions API capabilities quality, security and privacy.
